previousReleases.notes: Version awareness system, 7-day focus history, To-Do refinements

releaseNotes: Focus Insights system with time range selectors (Last 7/30 Days, 6/12 Months)
Advanced focus analytics with average/best/worst slot detection
QR Generator (13 types) with multi-format export (PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, HEIC)
QR Scanner with online API, smart type detection, and drag-drop support
QuickLink URL Shortener with API management and caching
Network-aware QR scanning with clear error messaging
Robust QuickLink API with error handling and fallback endpoints
Comprehensive stability improvements and user messaging
knownIssues: Heatmap cell interaction and date filtering still in development
QR code gradient and eye-style customization deferred to v06
HEIC export falls back to JPEG (system codec limitation)
QR scanning requires internet connection for online API mode
